all_evaluations.recommendation: Excellent image for 3D conversion. The object is clear, the background is simple, the lighting is good, the view angle is good, and the object is well-isolated.
Suitable for 3D reconstruction. Good clarity, lighting, and view angle, although a slightly simpler background would improve the score further.

issues: The view is slightly too head-on and doesn't give enough depth perception. More of a 3/4 angle would be better.
